sense.def: Illness Sign identical with kou jin 口噤 , clenched jaw. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 6: 治急中風，目瞑牙 噤，不能下藥，用此散，以中指點散子，揩齒三二十次，在大牙左右， 其口自開，始得下藥，開關散方 , “The recipe for the powder to open the jaws: it cures violent cases of being struck by wind, with the patient’s eyes closed and teeth clenched , and if he cannot ingest medication, then use this powder. Dip the middle finger into the powder and apply it to the teeth twenty to thirty times, to the left and right of the large teeth. This will cause his mouth to open, and he will be able to ingest medication”.
